lib
Class TextInputFormat

java.lang.Object
  interfaces.InputFormat<NullWritable,TextWritable>
      lib.TextInputFormat

public class TextInputFormat
extends InputFormat<NullWritable,TextWritable>

A text input format. The key is NullWritable and value is TextWritable. An entire string is assigned to the value with no key.
